ygData.subject: Re: Wizards in general
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I agree that it would be nice to get specialization implemented again. But besides that I think Wizards are powerfull enough. At higher levels it becomes
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Ken Morrison" <ken.morrison@...>
>Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eq_wizards] Wizards in general
>Date: Wed, 26 May 1999 13:24:33 -0400
>

>So come Wizards of Norrath, lets show our true Power. Get truly Offensive
>for once. Lets bombard Verant with /bugs, /feebacks and email demanding
>they improve our class. /Ignore the people on this list who say the class
>doesnt need change!

I agree that it would be nice to get specialization implemented again. But
besides that I think Wizards are powerfull enough.
At higher levels it becomes more apparent that a good group consists of 2
tanks (warrior for taunt or monks for good melee dam), a cleric or two.
Mayby a druid or shaman instead of one of the clerics. And finally 2
wizards. They are the real damage machines with enough mana to keep casting.
Tanks just take damage, clerics and others just buff and heal and wizards
just deals out damage.

Oh yeah the only class i know who can solo anything at lvl 40 without having
to much trouble is the wizard.

Rotas Koth
Apprentice Wizard, lvl 27, Innoruuk Server.
